lead_paragraph: The observation deck at the World Trade Center, the highest in the Western Hemisphere, has had a shortfall of visitors since it opened in May 2015.

headline.print_headline: 3.3 Million Were Expected at World Trade Center Attraction; a Million Haven’t Shown Up
headline.main: 3.3 Million Were Expected at Trade Center Attraction; a Million Haven’t Shown Up

snippet: The observation deck at the World Trade Center, the highest in the Western Hemisphere, has had a shortfall of visitors since it opened in May 2015.
abstract: Legends company, operator of One World Observatory atop 1 World Trade Center, has seen far fewer visitors to deck since 2015 opening than predicted; with only 2.3 million visitors since opening day, a million short of projections, Port Authority of New York and New Jersey is faced with commensurate shortfall in anticipated revenue.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
